name: Huntr
description: Huntr is a job search platform that streamlines application tracking, resume building, and interview preparation with AI-powered tools.
longDescription: Huntr is a comprehensive job search management platform designed to simplify and organize the job application process for job seekers. It offers a suite of AI-powered tools, including a resume builder, job tracker, and cover letter generator, to help users tailor their applications and stay organized. Founded to address the challenges of modern job searches, Huntr aims to reduce the stress of managing multiple applications by providing a centralized dashboard for tracking progress, storing documents, and analyzing job search metrics. The platform serves over 400,000 job seekers globally and is trusted by educational and career-focused institutions for its robust organizational capabilities. By integrating automation and AI, Huntr empowers users to create professional, job-specific materials quickly and efficiently, helping them stand out in competitive job markets. Its mission is to build powerful, user-focused tools that make the job search less daunting and more effective.
features: The AI resume builder creates tailored resumes in seconds, aligning skills and experiences with specific job descriptions for better employer fit.
The job tracker organizes applications using an intuitive Kanban board, allowing users to drag and drop jobs across stages like applied, interviewing, or offered.
The Chrome Job Clipper saves job details from any website with one click, storing URLs, salaries, and company data for easy access.
AI-powered cover letter generation crafts personalized cover letters by blending user backgrounds with job requirements, saving time and effort.
The resume checker analyzes resumes for spelling, metrics, and keyword optimization, improving chances of passing applicant tracking systems (ATS).
Job search metrics provide analytics on application progress, helping users identify areas for improvement and optimize their strategy.
The map view visualizes employer locations, enabling users to prioritize jobs based on commute preferences and geographic convenience.
The contact tracker manages networking connections, storing recruiter and professional contact details to maintain strong relationships.
One-click autofill streamlines job applications by populating forms with data from the user’s Huntr profile, reducing repetitive tasks.
The resume review tool offers AI-driven critiques, providing detailed feedback on content, style, and impact in under five minutes.

faqs.question: What is Huntr used for?
faqs.answer: Huntr is a job search platform that helps users organize applications, build tailored resumes, generate cover letters, and track job search progress with AI-powered tools.

faqs.question: Is there a free version of Huntr?
faqs.answer: Yes, Huntr offers a free plan with basic features like job tracking and limited AI credits, with premium features available in paid plans starting at $30/month.

faqs.question: How does the AI resume builder work?
faqs.answer: The AI resume builder analyzes job descriptions and user profiles to generate tailored resumes, incorporating relevant keywords and formatting to match employer expectations.

faqs.question: Can I track job applications from multiple websites?
faqs.answer: Yes, Huntr’s Chrome Job Clipper allows users to save job details from sites like Indeed, LinkedIn, and ATS systems with a single click.

faqs.question: Does Huntr support mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Huntr is available on iOS, Android, Chrome, and web platforms, though some users report limitations with mobile app functionality like saving jobs from other apps.

faqs.question: How does Huntr’s job matching feature work?
faqs.answer: Huntr extracts responsibilities and qualifications from job descriptions, compares them to your resume, and provides a match score with AI-generated suggestions for improvement.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my Huntr Pro subscription?
faqs.answer: Yes, users can cancel their subscription anytime via the 'Plan & Usage' section in account settings, with access reverting to the free plan at the end of the billing period.

faqs.question: Does Huntr store my data securely?
faqs.answer: Huntr securely stores job application details, resumes, and contacts, and users retain access to their data even after canceling a Pro subscription.
